typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		sid as string,
		sname as string,
		age as string,
		did as integer,
		sloc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> StudentData
source(output(
		dept_id as integer,
		dname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	preferredIntegralType: 'integer',
	preferredFractionalType: 'float') ~> DeptData
StudentData, DeptData join(did == dept_id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		sid,
		sname,
		age,
		sloc,
		dept_id,
		dname
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveColumns1
RemoveColumns1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['output.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	mapColumn(
		sid,
		sname,
		age,
		sloc,
		dname
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> StuDeptData
